fields.summary: iOS: ListView randomly not shown since 4.1.x

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When navigating to and from a ListView that has a custom template, sometimes the view stays completely empty. This is a 100% reoccuring issue in our project when following these steps:
1. Open List View (content visible)
2. Navigate back (iOS Navigation bar back button)
3. Open List View (content not visible)
All further trys except for the second one result in the content being visible.

*This issue is only related to the newest version of the studio. Version 4.0 works fine.*
fields.summary: iOS: ListView with custom template shows nothing

comments.body:
I can confirm is a very common problem, already discussed in slack, many people had the same issue, but cannot find a way to reproduce it, is absolutely random.

only with sdk 4.1.0 with listviews with custom layout
[~florian.dornbusch@pit.de]  So far we can not reproduce the issue, please send us more information and we will try again
I'm having the same issue, blank screen, it doesn't raise an error, the content appears after going back and opening the window again... I't started happening after I upgraded the app to 4.1.0

This issue is out of date with our current supported SDK release (7.5.2.GA as of the date of closure), and out of date with mobile OS versions. 

If community members feel that the issue is still valid, please create a new ticket. Please reference this closed ticket number, include SDK used, comments, and code that demonstrates/reproduces the issue.
